ModulePrefs.title: PHP Client Library Test App (Do not install!)
ModulePrefs.description: Do not install! This application is a placeholder for testing the OpenSocial PHP client library. By installing this application, your information will be viewable by anyone on the internet. For more information, please see http://opensocial-php-client.googlecode.com

Module.Content:
Please uninstall this application

This application is a placeholder for testing the OpenSocial PHP Client Library. If you have installed this application, your social network profile information can be viewed by anyone on the internet.
